package.name: Image_Transform_Driver_Imagick2
package.summary: Provides a standard interface to manipulate images, this is the Imagick 0.9 driver
package.description:
This package was written to provide a simpler and cross-library interface to doing image transformations and manipulations. This is the Imagick 0.9 driver, it will not work with the new Imagick extension, use the Imagick3 driver for that It provides :
* files related functions * addText * Scale (by length, percentage, maximum X/Y) * Resize * Rotate (custom angle) * Crop * Mirror * Flip
package.notes: - This driver was split off Image_Transform - Fixed Bug #9904: Typo in IM2::addText, should be $params not $parms - Fixed Bug #9541: Imagick2 resize() incorrectly maintains aspect ratio, i.e. not how the old Imagick driver did it - Fixed Bug #14711: typo on file Imagick2.php - strcasecomp instead of strcasecmp
